title: The secret is….!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Yoshiko-chan, I have something to ask you about!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! So, what did you want to ask?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>How can I become a cool school idol like Yoshi- Yohane-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Cool, huh…. Heh! To have realized that, you have some potential, Hanayo!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeh! I have potential!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yes, I can even make you a little demon of the highest rank if you want….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Do- does that mean I have to present something like an offering….? I don’t really have anything except onigiri…. Here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>“Onigiri” you say, you-! ….Huh, this is delicious<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Umm, actually, Kanata-chan told me that it’s a good idea to put a little bit of soup stock on rice that would be rolled into onigiri. It brings the flavor out, she said<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>*munch munch*.... Yeah, it’s really delicious…. *munch munch*.... Do you have any more?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
